item.title: .. NPC's Not Talking/ Tradeing
item.dc:creator: @liamrob liamrob
item.description:
@liamrob wrote:

Look for this below in your testscape source thing if there are already shop keepers in it in ctrl + F and maybe after a couple of searchs you will get it otherwise the first.

Search for Aubury or the code below

Code: else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop }
This is a bit of the shop codes where u gotta put part of da shop in. Then you gotta autospawn where u want the shop keeper to go and then go into shop.CFG and place in the shop there. It is a bit confusing but you’ll get it. I’ll show u one of my own stores.

You can place this in the shop area at the bottom of where the general store is.

Code: } else if (NPCID == 534) { //Fairy PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 47; //Special mage shop } else if (NPCID == 599)
Thats my special mage shop that sells runes and staffs and still more stuff to be edited into it.

Then off to the autospawn.CFG

Code: spawn = 534 3237 3436 0 0 0 0 0 1 Fairy_shop_keeper

That is the code for the fairyshop keeper on where she will stand. She stands next to the fountain at ::fish.

Now to the Shop.CFG file.

Code: shop = 50 @red@Special_@yel@Mage_@gre@Shop 2 2 4708 100 4710 100 4712 100 4714 100 554 10000000 555 10000000 556 10000000 557 10000000 558 10000000 560 10000000 561 10000000 562 10000000 563 10000000 564 10000000 565 10000000 6562 100 6563 100 6889 100

And that is the shop code bit. The 2 and 2 can be changed at the start to 1 1 so they are like a general store sell anything back buy anything back. 2 2 means can only sell back whats in the store stock.

So that should sum it up just edit those into the shop areas u want fixed. Then it should be done.

Thanks,
Please visit http://brunescapeforum.runboard.com and help my site.

Read full topic
